content: **crochet drops bag with popcorn-pattern in snow ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ **measurements** width approx 30 cm 11 ¾ height approx 25 cm 9 ¾ **materials** drops snow from garnstudio 250 g color no 50 dark pink mix drops crochet hook size 5 mm h/8 or size needed to get 13 single_crochet = width 10 cm 4
